description: Difference of maximal and central values of A001222 when applied to {C(n,k)} set.
example: n=24: the sums of prime factor exponents when k runs from 0 to 24 are {0,4,4,5,5,7,6,8,6,8,8,9,7,9,8,8,6,8,6,7,5,5,4,4,0}. The central value is 7, the maximal is 9 so a(24)=9-7.
author: _Labos Elemer_
